descriptionHtml:
This is the first texture I have ever made for Skyrim XD and I plan on redoing all of the jewelry in skyrim to make it HD. :)   

The vanilla version was 256 x 256 and my texture is 1024 x 1024 

After you install my mod many popular \"standard\" rings will change their appearance to my version. Only colors may be slightly different \"mainly gold and silver\" and sometimes they will have gems.

-----------------------------------------
           Installation
-----------------------------------------
There are two methods:

1. if you don\'t use Nexus Mod Manager simply download one of the 7z file extract it and copy the contents to your Skyrim installation folder
\\Data\\textures\\armor\\amuletsandrings. 

-----------------------------------------
           Uninstallation
-----------------------------------------
For those who use Nexus Mod Manager I will not explain what to do. 

To uninstall the mod manually:
1) From the folder ..\\Data\\textures\\armor\\amuletsandrings remove following files:
genericrings.dds
genericrings_n.dds

-----------------------------------------
            Tool Used
----------------------------------------
Adobe Photoshop CS5.1 (64 Bit)
Crazybump
7-ZIP (64 Bit)
author: AJ47951
